name: Music_5165.wav
caption: This is a lullaby music piece. There is a female vocalist singing gently. The acoustic guitar is playing a mellow tune while the bass guitar accompanies with a simple bass line. There is a synth with a string sound in the background. The atmosphere is calming and sleep-inducing. This piece could be played at nurseries and it could be included in the soundtracks meant to put babies to sleep.
